Guys, if you ever see a "crack download" link pointing to bayfiles.com *DO NOT FOLLOW IT*

They arent real, ever. It's just another bullshit site that tries to trick you into downloading other bullshit and install adware all over your machine. (in this case, bayfiles tries to trick you into installing iLivid, which is a useless download manager that shows you ads all day long, as if there aren't enough ads in the world already.)

And if  you go to ANY site claiming you must complete a survey before downloading something *JUST LEAVE* because NONE of them are legit. Also, if you look, they all say "if it doesn't download after completing a survey, just take another survey and it should go."

That means it's fucking fake. Let me repeat for the slow people: *NOT ONE DOWNLOAD-FOR-A-SURVEY WEBSITE IS LEGIT*!!!
Soo unfortunately it looks like everyone here is back at square one waiting for Skidrow to give us the proper files :)

This is great that some one posted the game finally (it was out on the 5th on another site) but there is no point in downloading it. Why? 

Because chances are since it uses online activation this "retail" copy will not work with any released crack. This one's not going to be as simple as copy and paste some hacked EXE file. 

IF it is ever cracked, an entirely new installer system will have to be created in order to bypass the Origin software that forces you to use it to activate the game. Think about that before you jump the gun and waste your download/upload bandwidth on this torrent. 

This game will have similar protection like Diablo III and to date there is no crack or hack to simulate the online mode 100%. 

-two cents

For those of you who say that games that originally require an Internet connection in order to be played, and thus cannot be cracked... you're wrong. There were tons of games that required the Internet connection and were still cracked by either notifying the player that his/her connection should be disabled (so the game doesn't connect to the servers) or by simply disabling the internet connectivity requirement in the game (where the game notifies that it cannot connect, even though your internet connection is on).
It CAN be cracked, it's just a matter of when. IT guy here.
